body:
I've recently started making skins and i thought i wa  pretty good. So here is a shop for yall!! Btw, animal skins will probably take longer to make than humans. 


Layout:

Do you want the skin to be shaded?

Dark Shading or Light Shading?

What skin? (MUST BE BERY BERY DETAILED DESCRIPTION)

Why do you want one?

Do you have an email i can use to send the skin file to?





If you want a skin, you must post the word "cake" somewhere in your post so i know you read through it. If you dont, the skin will not be made.

replies.body:
IGN: DiamondPorkchop3
Layout: Idk
Shading: No dem shading
What Skin: A pig with gamer headphones that are blue with a mic.  MLGPorky's glasses on it xD and yeah no nipples on the pig make sure to include a tail.
Why do I want it: I really like pigs and I've been searching forever for a pig skin I'll keep forever.
Email: Nah just post the download link here so I can download it.
Edit: Cake.

replies.body:
Do you want the skin to be shaded? Yes

Dark Shading or Light Shading? Dark

What skin? (MUST BE BERY BERY DETAILED DESCRIPTION) Use dull colours like grey and brown but make his eyes bright red. give him a furry tail and make sure he looks shaggy and ragged.

Why do you want one?I want a more personalized skin not just one i find on a website and I'm not very good at making my own

Do you have an email i can use to send the skin file to? No when youre finished put the picture here and ill save it

I read the guidelines cake

replies.body:
-·-·-·ATTENTION-·-·-·

I will no longer respond or create skins that are wanted on this topic. If you would like me to make you a skin, please go over to X_Heat's Skin Factory. This has been going on for a very short amount of time, sadly. For those who have been waiting a long time, I will try and make your skins. If they do not come in 3 days please post a comment on X_Heat's Factory! 

Thank You! It has been fun making skins for y'all!!
